{"id":636015727,"lang":"cpp","time":"6Â months, 2Â weeks","timestamp":1644188321,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/636015727/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Integer to English Words","memory":"6.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    \n    string ones[10] =\n    {\"Zero\",\"One\",\"Two\",\"Three\",\"Four\",\"Five\",\"Six\",\"Seven\",\"Eight\",\"Nine\"};\n    string tens[10] =\n    {\"\",\"\",\"Twenty\",\"Thirty\",\"Forty\",\"Fifty\",\"Sixty\",\"Seventy\",\"Eighty\",\"Ninety\"};\n    string specials[10]=\n    {\"Ten\",\"Eleven\",\"Twelve\",\"Thirteen\",\"Fourteen\",\"Fifteen\",\"Sixteen\",\"Seventeen\",\n     \"Eighteen\",\"Nineteen\"};   \n    \n    \n    string numberToWords(int num) {\n        if( num == 0) return \"Zero\";\n        string val = helper(num);\n        return val.substr(0,val.length()-1);\n    }\n    \n    \n    string helper(int num){\n        if(num>=1000000000){\n            return helper(num/1000000000)+\"Billion \"+helper(num%1000000000);\n        }\n        else if (num >=1000000){\n            return helper(num/1000000)+\"Million \"+helper(num%1000000);\n        }\n        else if(num >=1000){\n            return helper(num/1000)+\"Thousand \"+helper(num%1000);\n        }\n        else if(num>=100){\n            return helper(num/100)+\"Hundred \"+helper(num%100);\n        }\n        else if (num>=20){\n            return tens[num/10]+\" \"+helper(num%10);\n       }\n        else if(num>=10){\n            return specials[num - 10] + \" \";\n        }\n        else if(num>=1){\n            return ones[num]+\" \";\n        }\n        return \"\";\n    }\n        \n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"integer-to-english-words"}
